messages.message:
In Converse, the scrolling for a lenghty document is hard.
I cant use the scroll-bar properly. The bar is already at the bottom, but i still have many pages to go till the end.
@Aayush can you take a look at the long doc behavior for the doc widget and see if there's anything we can do here to make it smoother? This must have something to do with the virtualization
